Posts.Content: Hi Yvonne,    I have just join the group so I am late in replying and I seen ladies give you good advice and that is helping you great. I also lost interest in sex since 2003 when I was first had cancer and since then I was feeling same as you. But as your's my husband is quiet understanding and it helped me a lot. My prayers are with you love to all brave ladies.
Posts.Title: I need to ask a very personal question?

Posts.Content: My prayers are with you dear all the very best
Posts.Title: One down.!!
